## Contract Notice for Canopy Handling Course

### Notice Title

W0133-22K652 - Canopy Handling Course / W0133-22K652 - Cours de manœuvre de la voilure

### Solicitation Details

 * Reference Number: WS3640420144-Doc3884213199
 * Solicitation Number: WS3640420144
 * Publication Date: March 21, 2023
 * Tender Closing Date: April 12, 2023, 14:00:00
 * Amended Date: March 21, 2023

### Contract Closeouts

 * Tender Status: Expiré / Expired
 * Contract Close Date: None

### Contract Details

 * Expected Contract Start Date: None
 * Expected Contract End Date: None
 * Contract Duration: Multiple Training Periods

### Procurement Method

The Department of National Defence - Canadian Forces School of Search and Rescue (CFSSAR) is seeking subject matter experts to provide training on advanced canopy handling techniques. The training will be held on specific dates, including:

 * 2-5 May 2023
 * To be confirmed in 2024
 * Option to provide training in 2025 and 2026, subject to minor date adjustments

### Selection Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the qualified bidder who achieves the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is open to bidders who are participating in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Infrastructure and Maintenance Support

Training will be provided in British Columbia.

### Buyer Contact Information

To access the contract notice and related documents, visit the following link:
* [Notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15764738?extsite=MTU3NjQ3MzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* Contact: Shaylan Stein (SPAC/PSPC), Email: [shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:shaylan.stein@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
